content.section: Quad Tank is a tier 3 tank that can be selected upon reaching level 30 using "Twin" or "Flank Guard", and at level 45, can be upgraded into "Octo Tank" or "Auto 5". It features 4 barrels each perpendicular to each other. This tank is often skipped when upgrading due to it having less focused power in one direction than Twin, however when pressing C + E (auto spin and auto fire), it upgrades very fast as it covers a wide area of shapes.

- The Quad Tank, alongside "Twin Flank", are the only two tanks to upgrade from two different tier 2 tanks. - The achievement for upgrading to Quad Tank is "C + E". - Quad Tank was the fifth tank to be added to the game, after Triple Shot; with its ID being '4'. - In one of the oldest versions, Quad Tank used to upgrade into Triple Shot at level 45, which subsequently upgraded into Octo Tank at level 60.
